---
name: "Activity Tracking and Participation"
about: "Feature request for tracking participation and achievements in club activities."
title: "[Feature] Activity Tracking and Participation"
labels: [enhancement]
---

## Feature Description
Track member participation in club activities, including attendance, achievements, or points. Allow members and admins to view participation history and statistics.

## Acceptance Criteria
- System records attendance and achievements for each member
- Members and admins can view participation records
- Optionally, display leaderboards or achievement badges

## Additional Notes
Ensure privacy and data security for participation records.
